params.inputBox: The input box used by the portal

params.baseLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the base layer
params.execLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the execution layer
params.tokenId: The identifier of the token being transferred

depositSingleERC1155Token(address,addres.notice: Transfer ERC-1155 tokens of a single type to an application contract and add an input to the application's input box to signal such operation. The caller must enable approval for the portal to manage all of their tokens beforehand, by calling the `setApprovalForAll` function in the token contract.

getInputBox().notice: Get the input box used by this portal.
